Package com.xebisco.yield

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AudioManager
    The AudioManager interface should be implemented by the specific platform running the application, it contains function for manipulation audio files.
    Behavior
    The Behavior is the main interface of the Yield Game Engine, almost all elements of an application implements this interface.
    ComponentModifier  
    Disposable
    An interface that contains the 'dispose()' method.
    EntityStarter  
    FontLoader  
    InputManager  
    PixelProcessor  
    PlatformGraphics
    The `PlatformGraphics` interface is a wrapper around the platform's graphics API.
    Renderable  
    TextureManager
    The TextureManager interface should be implemented by the specific platform running the application, it contains function for manipulation image files.
    ViewportZoomScale  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    The Animation class represents a sequence of textures with a delay and loop option, and can be disposed.
    AnimationPlayer
    The AnimationPlayer class is a component behavior that handles the playing of animations by updating the texture rectangle with the current frame.
    Application
    It's a class that implements the `Behavior` interface and is responsible for rendering the scene and updating the entities
    ApplicationManager
    It's a class that manages multiple applications.
    AudioPlayer
    The AudioPlayer class is a component behavior that allows for playing, pausing, and manipulating audio clips in a Yield application.
    Axis
    The class "Axis" represents an input axis with keys for positive and negative values, and can store and retrieve its current value.
    BlankScene
    The BlankScene class sets the background color to black for a given application.
    Color
    A color stored in a separated RGB values.
    Colors
    It's a collection of static final Color objects that represent the default colors used by GrADS
    ComponentBehavior
    ComponentBehavior is an abstract class that implements the Behavior and Renderable interfaces.
    ComponentCreation
    The ComponentCreation class represents the creation of a component with a specified behavior and modifier.
    Context
    It's a class that runs a runnable at a specified frame-rate
    ContextTime
    It's a container for time-related variables
    DrawInstruction
    It's a data structure that holds all the information needed to draw a rectangle, oval, text, line, or image
    Entity2D
    The Entity2D class is a final class that extends Entity2DContainer and implements Renderable and Disposable, and contains various methods and properties for managing components and rendering.
    Entity2DContainer
    This is a class that represents a container for 2D entities, allowing for instantiation and removal of entities.
    Entity2DPrefab
    The Entity2DPrefab class is a blueprint for creating 2D entities with components, children, and tags.
    EquilateralTriangle
    The EquilateralTriangle class extends the Rectangle class and sets the draw instruction type to equilateral triangle.
    ExitWithEscapeKey
    This class exits the application when the escape key is pressed.
    FileInput
    The FileInput class provides methods for obtaining an InputStream from a file path or an existing InputStream.
    Font
    The Font class represents a font loaded from a file or input stream with a specified size and font loader.
    Global
    Static collection of util methods.
    GPUPixelProcessor Deprecated.
    ImmutableColor
    The ImmutableColor class extends the Color class and overrides its methods to prevent modification of its properties.
    ImmutableSize2D
    The ImmutableSize2D class extends Size2D and overrides the setX and setY methods to throw an exception, making it immutable.
    Input
    The class "Input" contains two enums, "Key" and "MouseButton", which list various keyboard and mouse input options.
    Oval
    Oval extends Rectangle and overrides onStart() to set the DrawInstruction's type to OVAL.
    Pixel
    The `Pixel` class represents a pixel with a color and an index.
    PlatformInit
    It's a class that holds the initial configuration of the specific platform.
    Rectangle
    It's a behavior that draws a rectangle
    Scene
    The Scene class is an abstract class that extends Entity2DContainer and implements Behavior, and contains various systems and properties for managing a scene.
    Size2D
    A Size2D is a TwoAnchorRepresentation that represents a width and a height.
    StandardPrefabs
    The StandardPrefabs class provides methods for creating 2D entity prefabs with text, rectangles, and texture rectangles components.
    SystemBehavior
    This is an abstract class that implements the Behavior interface and contains methods for managing scenes.
    Text
    This is a class for rendering text with customizable font, color, and content.
    Texture
    The Texture class represents an image texture and provides methods for processing and manipulating it.
    TextureRectangle
    This is a class that extends the Rectangle class and adds functionality for rendering textures with options for scaling and processing pixels.
    TextureRectangleLoader
    This class loads a texture for a TextureRectangle component.
    Transform2D
    It represents the position, size, scale, and rotation of a 2D object
    TwoAnchorRepresentation
    It's a representation of a point in 2D space
    Vector2D
    Vector2D is a TwoAnchorRepresentation that represents a vector in 2D space.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Color.Format
    This enumeration is used to specify the format of the color value when creating a new `Color` object.
    DrawInstruction.Type  
    Input.Key  
    Input.MouseButton  
    RectangleAnchor  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ImmutableBreakException
    An ImmutableBreakException is thrown when an immutable object changes its properties.
    TextureProcessException
    The TextureProcessException class is a custom exception that extends the RuntimeException class.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    NonEditable  
    VisibleOnInspector
